pages.text: As your travels continue you just might find that 36 items just isn't enough ... especially if you spend much time mining.

Backpacks can carry up to 18 items and can not only be expanded to carry more items but also upgraded with additional useful features.$(br) $(br2)More information can be found in $(l:mods/sophisticatedbackpacks)this chapter$(/l).
Rather than holding many different kinds of items, the Seed Pouch will hold many (10) stacks of $(o)one$() item ... seeds, specifically.

A must have for the budding engineer, the Toolbox has slots dedicated to your tools of the trade, as well as various components, food, and more.$(br2)More information can be found within the Engineer's Manual.
Tired of Mystical Flowers filling up your inventory?  This handy pouch will hold them all so you don't have to.$(br2) $(br2)More information can be found$(br)  within the Lexica Botania.
A handy case for those that like switching out their Trinkets with regularity.$(br) $(br2) $(br2)More information can be found within the Lexica Botania.
The bag that is not actually a bag, the Ender Pouch allows you to access the contents of the linked Ender Chest on the go.
